item.title: Metro UI: Initial Thoughts
item.description: I’ve been digesting all the new information around Windows 8 and Metro over the past week. I’ve watched the BUILD Conference Channel 9 Videos, read the articles and docs on the Windows Dev Center and the Building Windows 8 blog. The best resource for your time on learning what Metro is all about from a design perspective is 8 traits of great Metro style apps. The Metro Style interface is a totally new and original approach to UI.
